levels.description:
ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, increases DEF of self and Mobile Riot Shield by <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>, and increases duration of Mobile Riot Shield by <@ba.vup>+{duration}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>

ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, increases DEF of self and Mobile Riot Shield by <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>, and increases duration of Mobile Riot Shield by <@ba.vup>+{duration}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>Unlimited duration</>
